thread.title: Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants
thread.title_full: Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants

title: Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants
text:
Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants Bills coach Rex Ryan rules out LeSean McCoy, Sammy Watkins playing against Giants Post to Facebook Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants Bills coach Rex Ryan rules out LeSean McCoy, Sammy Watkins playing against Giants Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1FIT7v7 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Bills' McCoy, Watkins ruled out for game against Giants AP 2:51 p.m. EDT October 1, 2015 (Photo: The Associated Press) 1 CONNECT 18 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ORCHARD PARK, N.Y. (AP) â€” Buffalo Bills coach Rex Ryan ruled out running back LeSean McCoy and receiver Sammy Watkins from playing against the New York Giants on Sunday. 
Ryan initially said he'd never use the word "out" after the two players missed their second straight day of practice Thursday. 
Then, Ryan shook his head sideways and said reporters could figure it out on their own. 
McCoy is sitting out to rest a left hamstring injury that's nagged him since he was hurt Aug. 18. Watkins was sidelined after hurting his right calf in a win at Miami on Sunday. 
Starting right guard John Miller (groin) missed his second straight practice. Safety Aaron Williams (neck) practiced on a limited basis, and has a chance to play after missing one game. 
___
